title: News24.com | LIST | Here's what you can and can't do during level 4 of the lockdown
description: President Cyril Ramaphosa has shed light on what the country's new reality will look like when the lockdown continues beyond the end of April, albeit in another format.
content:
President Cyril Ramaphosa has shed light on what the country's new reality will look like when the lockdown continues beyond the end of April, albeit in another format.
